You are now ready to edit your article and create new ones!
In the frontmatter block, you can pass additional options for displaying your article, such as displaying badges on the image:

---
cover: path/to/cover
date: 2022-08-23
badges: [{
  color: 'white',
  bg: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)',
  content: 'Technology'
}]
---
